name: sherwani
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a coat that comes down to the knees and that has buttons up to the neck, worn especially by South Asian men: It was a joyous occasion at which men and women dressed in traditional Pakistani clothing - a sherwani, or long coat, for the men; a shalwar kameez (baggy slacks and long tunic) with dupatta (long scarf) for women.
More examplesFewer examplesThe 56-year-old Booker Prize-winning author looked suitably bridegroomish in a long black sherwani.Shoaib will be wearing a black sherwani that was made by designers Shantanu and Nikhil.The cricket star turned populist politician will be wearing an old sherwani, or traditional coat-length garment.Dressed in ceremonial crown and white sherwani jacket with gold tinsel, he looked like a prince on his way to his royal wedding.
